thread.title: High-End Agricultural Business

title: High-End Agricultural Business
text: Questions Business Summary This irrigation business is about to explode with growth. The seller has decided it is time to retire even though he is expanding the business now. The new owner will reap the benefits of the seller who has over 30 years of expertise. This business offers expert service on irrigation installations, add-ons, upgrades, repairs and maintenance. This profitable business solves all water needs from installing new systems to maintenance to repair. It also is experiencing great success with superior outdoor lighting installations of path lights, downlights, uplights, and specialty lights. This company has partnered with two of the largest outdoor Lighting Companies in the country! When customers in need think irrigation and lighting in the surrounding three counties they think of this company since 2004. Their reputation precedes them with over 3000 satisfied customers. Just read the provided testimonials. They are DHEC certified, trained, and approved with most all water systems in the Upstate. Call today because it will not last long. Financials
